education_certification.credential: Valid NJ Barber/Cosmetology permit or license

duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain a valid NJ Barber/Cosmetology permit or license to perform cosmetology services.
Commit to learning and be present during business hours to provide cosmetology services.
Receive guidance and support from senior staff to navigate the learning process and become successful in the cosmetology trade.
Embrace the challenging yet rewarding nature of the cosmetology industry and strive to grow and excel in the role.
